name: Test Device Multitouch
description:
Would you like to know how much touch for your mobile device support?

MultiTouch Test Device will show how your phone's hardware handles multi-touch.
- Show your touch points with a colorful circle and coorinate line
- Show position of pointers
- Count total pointers of multi-touch
- Show Maximum touch

This app will help you to check and test your mobile device.
When you buy new device or second hand mobile device
Also your current device.

I hope you will love this app. Please review and comment
